title: Charmingly Restored Historic House in Trendy Oltaszyn
description: Step into this beautifully preserved 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom house, where timeless architectural details meet modern comforts. The property boasts a spacious living area illuminated by a state-of-the-art lighting system, period hardwood floors, and a sun-filled kitchen appointed for gourmet meals. All bedrooms offer private retreats, with the master featuring an elegant ensuite bathroom. A shared neighborhood sauna rounds out the blend of luxury and historic character.
neighborhood_description: Located in Wroclaw’s sought-after Oltaszyn district, this home lies at the heart of a trendy, dynamic, and rapidly growing neighborhood brimming with historic charm. Residents enjoy local cafés, dining hotspots, authentic local shops, and easy highway access for smooth travel in and out of the city. The area strikes a perfect balance between traditional grace and a vibrant modern atmosphere.
lifestyle_benefits: Appealing blend of history and modern upgrades
Strong rental demand due to neighborhood popularity
Proximity to local boutiques, dining, and parks
target_buyer: Ideal for property investors who value historic settings, contemporary upgrades, and robust rental opportunities within trending neighborhoods.
market_positioning: A rare opportunity in Oltaszyn for investors seeking attractive long-term value in Wroclaw’s evolving real estate landscape; refurbished homes of this character and quality are highly sought after yet seldom available.
